headline.print_headline: Climate Change Reaches Courts as Citizens Sue
headline.main: In Novel Tactic on Climate Change, Citizens Sue Their Governments

snippet: An American nonprofit is suing on behalf of 21 young plaintiffs, and a farmer in Peru sued a German energy utility over its part in causing global warming.
abstract: Lawsuit filed by environmental nonprofit Our Children's Trust against federal government on behalf of 21 American teenagers is one of number across world in which young people are trying to use judiciary to compel their governments to take action on climate change; some legal analysts say suit could become landmark case if it proceeds further, as judge has allowed it to, while others are skeptical that it will make it very far.
